channel.title: Open up the window "enter ammount to deposit"
channel.description:
how can i open just that without opening up the bank.
I am making a gambleing chest where u click the chest, put money in, and then it gives you /2 to *1.5 of it. (ie if u insert 1000k, it can give 500k to 1500k and its a random number in between them)
I have it coded out but the "Please type how much to deposit"
I could probably figure out how to make it work if i hyave the id # for the screen, but not sure
